Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago Avenue, Cicero, Augusta, and Austin due to, street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago Avenue, Cicero, Augusta, and Austin due to, street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.
